add_library(sqlite3 sqlite3/sqlite3.c)
set_property(TARGET sqlite3 PROPERTY POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
target_compile_definitions(sqlite3 PRIVATE SQLITE_ENABLE_COLUMN_METADATA SQLITE_ENABLE_STAT4 SQLITE_MAX_EXPR_DEPTH=10000 SQLITE_USE_URI=1)
target_include_directories(sqlite3 PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
target_link_libraries(sqlite3 ${CMAKE_DL_LIBS})
